title: Bug 121170 - get column label from meta data object should return some user recognizable strings
OB: The labels returned from calling IMetaData.getColumnLabel() before data extraction are null, while the labels returned after data extraction are recognizable strings.
EB: The labels returned from calling IMetaData.getColumnLabel() before data extraction should also be recognizable strings.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Call IMetaData.getColumnLabel() before data extraction.
2. Retrieve the labels returned.
3. Note that the labels are null.
4. Call IMetaData.getColumnLabel() after data extraction.
5. Retrieve the labels returned.
6. Note that the labels are recognizable strings.
